External Collection

external_collection.ExternalCollection(**kwargs)

The ExternalCollection model holds External Collection data conforming to the EBA NPL Template specification EBA Templates

Note

The EBA Templates make a distinction between collections at loan and counterparty level. At present this is not implemented

class npl_portfolio.external_collection.ExternalCollection(*args, **kwargs)

The ExternalCollection model holds External Collection data conforming to the EBA NPL Template specification EBA Templates

Note

The EBA Templates make a distinction between collections at loan and counterparty level. At present this is not implemented

Child.parent is a ForwardManyToOneDescriptor instance.
